title: Will Wout van Aert Race the Tour de France? Why Visma-Lease a Bike Needs WVA More Than Ever
content:
Van Aert is inching back to full training after his devastating crash, but his race schedule is TBD. Here's why his return to the Tour should be a no-brainer.

Read the full article at Will Wout van Aert Race the Tour de France? Why Visma-Lease a Bike Needs WVA More Than Ever on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
